Interface PaymentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PaymentServiceImpl
public interface PaymentService
Service interface for payment operations. Handles fine payments and outstanding balance queries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BigDecimal
    getTotalUnpaid(int userId)
    Calculates the total amount of unpaid fines for a user.
    List<Fine>
    getUnpaidFines(int userId)
    Retrieves all unpaid fines for a specific user.
    void
    payAllFinesForUser(int userId)
    Pays all outstanding fines for a user.
    void
    payFine(int fineId)
    Pays a specific fine.

  • Method Details

    • getUnpaidFines

      List<Fine> getUnpaidFines(int userId)
      Retrieves all unpaid fines for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      list of unpaid fines

    • getTotalUnpaid

      BigDecimal getTotalUnpaid(int userId)
      Calculates the total amount of unpaid fines for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      total unpaid amount

    • payAllFinesForUser

      void payAllFinesForUser(int userId)
      Pays all outstanding fines for a user. Marks all unpaid fines as paid with the current date.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user

    • payFine

      void payFine(int fineId)
      Pays a specific fine. Marks the fine as paid with the current date.
      Parameters:
      fineId - the ID of the fine to pay
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if fine not found
